attributes.action: Watching Parliament live on TV, without the need for a TV licence
attributes.additional_details: Allow for the watching of Parliament live without the need for a TV licence, as being a democratic country we should be allowed to observe our elected politicians without the need to pay a TV licence fee. This will give more people a greater insight into the workings of Parliament, including those who cannot afford a TV licence.

rejection.details:
It is possible to watch Parliament without a tv licence on

http://www.parliamentlive.tv/Main/Home.aspx
